name: Caterpillar Inc.
summary: Caterpillar Inc. is the world's leading manufacturer of construction and mining equipment, off-highway diesel and natural gas engines, industrial gas turbines, and diesel-electric locomotives. Headquartered in Irving, Texas, Caterpillar operates globally and serves customers in nearly 200 countries, supporting infrastructure, energy, and resource industries with innovative products and services. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the symbol CAT and has a legacy of nearly 100 years of industrial leadership.
